---
title: "About us"
---

We are part of NEOF (NERC Environmental Omics Facility). 
We provide omics sequencing, funding, and training opportunities to UK-based environmental researchers.
To find out more about us please check the following links:

- [Main NEOF website](https://neof.org.uk/)
- [NEOF Training page including bioinformatics courses to register to](https://neof.org.uk/training/)
- [NEOF opportunities](https://neof.org.uk/opportunities/)
- [Sign up for the NEOF newsletter](https://eepurl.com/heBOiX)
- [NEOF Bluesky](https://bsky.app/profile/nerc-eof.bsky.social)
